huffman

Class Huffman

  • java.lang.Object
    • huffman.Huffman

  • public class Huffman
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods implementing (de)compression by Huffman coding.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Huffman() 

    • Method Summary

      • Huffman

        public Huffman()

    • Method Detail

      • calculateFrequencies

        public static int[] calculateFrequencies(java.io.InputStream ins)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Calculate the frequencies of characters in the input.
        Parameters:
        ins - The input stream. All remaining data is consumed.
        Returns:
        An array where the element with index i is the frequency of the character i in the data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • buildTree

        public static HuffmanTree buildTree(int[] freqs)
        Build a Huffman tree from the given frequencies.
        Parameters:
        freqs - The frequencies. Must be a size 256 array of (non-negative) integers.
        Returns:
        A corresponding Huffman tree.

      • findCode

        public static BitVector findCode(HuffmanTreeNode node)
        Find the Huffman code of a given input character.
        Parameters:
        node - A leaf node representing the character.
        Returns:
        The code for the character.

      • compress

        public static void compress(java.io.InputStream ins,
            int[] freqs,
            BitOutputStream outs)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Compress a list of bytes.
        Parameters:
        ins - The input data. All remaining data is consumed.
        freqs - The character frequencies for data.
        outs - The bit stream to write the compressed data to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • decompress

        public static void decompress(BitInputStream bits,
              int[] freqs,
              java.io.OutputStream outs)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Decompress a list of bits.
        Parameters:
        bits - The input bits. Must be something produced by compress().
        freqs - The frequencies of the bytes in the original input.
        outs - The stream to append the decompressed data to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeHeader

        public static void writeHeader(java.io.OutputStream outs,
               int[] freqs,
               int actualBitCount)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Write header information to a stream. The header consists of: - the four headerMagik bytes - a table of 256 4-byte integers containing the frequency data
        Parameters:
        outs - The stream.
        freqs - The frequencies.
        actualBitCount - The bit count.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readHeader

        public static int[] readHeader(java.io.InputStream ins)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Read header information from a stream.
        Parameters:
        ins - The stream.
        Returns:
        The frequencies.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        writeHeader(OutputStream, int[], int)

      • compressFile

        public static void compressFile(java.io.InputStream ins,
                java.io.OutputStream outs)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Compress a file into another file.
        Parameters:
        ins - Input stream. Must be resettable.
        outs - Output stream. Will contain a header.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • decompressFile

        public static void decompressFile(java.io.InputStream ins,
                  java.io.OutputStream outs)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Decompress a file into another file.
        Parameters:
        ins - Input stream. Must contain a header.
        outs - Output stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
